home.heading: Welcome to Justcoin!
home.sub-heading: Justcoin is a digital currency exchange and Ripple gateway. We currently support Bitcoin, Litecoin and ripples (XRP)
home.bitcoin.heading: Bitcoin
home.bitcoin.body: You can deposit and withdraw BTC (three confirmations)
home.ripple.heading: Ripple
home.ripple.body: Justcoin operates a Ripple gateway, meaning you can deposit and withdraw BTC/LTC to Ripple through Justcoin.
home.exchange.heading: Exchange BTC/LTC/XRP
home.exchange.body: Once you sign up, you can buy and sell BTC/LTC for XRP on our exchange. Alternatively, you can withdraw BTC/LTC to Ripple and exchange there.
register.heading: Start using Justcoin.
register.email.label: Email address
register.password.label: Password
register.repeat.label: Repeat password
register.advanced.label: Expert user?
register.advanced.intro:
Use Bitcoin: Easy to send and receive Bitcoin

Expert user: Difficult to learn. Has limit orders, LTC, XRP, Ripple IOUs

You can change this later.

verifyphone.heading: Verify phone
verifyphone.intro: To make your account more secure, we'll now call you and read a four digit code. Don't worry, we're paying for the call.
withdraws.heading: Withdraw requests
terms.heading: Terms of Service
terms.body:
Updated 2013-05-18.

The trading fee is 0.5% (both when you are buying and selling.)
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
depositnok.heading: Deposit with Norwegian bank transfer
depositnok.intro: To deposit NOK with Norwegian bank transfer, send using the details below. Make sure that the message to recipient is correct.
identity.heading: Profile
identity.intro: Before you deposit or withdraw, we'll need to know some more about you.
verifyemail.heading: Verify email
verifyemail.intro: To make your account more secure, we'll now verify your email. Ready?
resetPassword.heading: Reset your password
resetPassword.intro:
To reset your password, you will need access to the email and phone number you registered with.

We will first email you a link. After you click the link, go back to this window.
withdrawbank.heading: Withdraw to a bank account
withdrawbank.intro: Please note that bank withdraws are handled manually.
withdrawbank.no bank account error: You have no verified bank accounts.

simple.buy.payment.disclaimer.heading: Justcoin is an exchange
simple.buy.payment.disclaimer.body: How many bitcoins you receive depends on the market exchange rate when we register your deposit.
simple.sell.heading: Sell Bitcoin
simple.sell.no-bank-accounts-error: To withdraw to a bank account, you first need to register it. You can register a bank account by depositing any amount from it.
